import React from 'react'; import {Card, CardActions, CardActionArea, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; const NewsCard = ({article: {description, publishedArt, source, title, url, urlToImage}, i }) => { return (
{(new Date(publishedAt)).toDateString()} {source.name}
{title} {description} {i + 1} ) } export default NewsCard;
